DataElement.preferredName: Primary Malignant Neoplasm Longest Diameter Measurement

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Malignant Neoplasm Longest Diameter Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A malignant tumor at the original site of growth._Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several._The length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle or sphere and connecting two points on the circumference._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
